Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay lets tackle this First I need to understand the process in the event log Each case starts with an Initiate Request then various activities like Verify Documents Call Customer Submit Additional etc But some activities repeat so I need to figure out their meaning and rename them accordingly

Name: Inductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Starting with C001 The first activity is Initiate Request Then when the agent checks documents thats Verify Documents But then theres a Call Customer with incomplete docs Wait so the initial process might be customer submits agent checks then they call for more info Then they submit the scan which leads to another Verify Then they submit something else maybe adjust the account Wait in C001 the activity Submit Additional is mentioned but the next activity after that is Verify Documents again So maybe the process is submit the scan then re-check documents Then they proceed to adjust the account Wait in C001 theres an adjustment after the submit So maybe the process is submit scan verify documents re-check then adjust account submit additional then verify again

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: But in C001 the activity Submit Additional happens but then the next activity is Verify Documents again So maybe Submit Additional is renaming to something like Upload Scan to indicate uploading the scanned document Then Verify Documents is reusing the same name but with context But in C001 they have two instances of Verify Documents once after the scan submission and once after the adjustment So maybe Verify Documents is renaming to Double-Verify to show that its a two-step process

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Similarly for C002 The first activity is Initiate Request again then Verify Documents Call Customer Adjust Account etc So maybe Call Customer can be renamed to Follow-Up Call to show that its a step after the initial call Then Adjust Account could be renamed to Internal Correction to indicate that its an internal step

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: For C003 the process is walk-in check ID call customer adjust account re-verify approve So Call Customer could be renamed to Check Customer to show that its a step for verification Adjust Account is internal correction so maybe Internal Correction again

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Now I need to make sure each renamed activity clearly reflects their context For example Submit Additional in C001 becomes Upload Scan to indicate uploading a document Verify Documents in C001 becomes Double-Verify to show two steps So compiling all these the revised log would have each activity renamed with their new context Then justifying each rename briefly That should cover all the steps
